sentences.en: Her manner offstage, like her manner on, is somewhat surly.
sentences.cn: 她台下和台上的举止如出一辙，都有些粗暴无礼。
演员们正在舞台后面等着.
这笔交易是私下里做的.

sentences.en: The stars were having an offstage relationship.
sentences.cn: 这对明星在现实生活中发展出恋情。

trans.tran_cn: 舞台外的；幕后的，（演员的）现实生活的，私生活的；舞台下的
trans.tran_en: Offstage is used to describe the behaviour of actors or entertainers in real life, when they are not performing
